text: Bill Farmer (born November 14, 1952) is an American voice actor, comedian and impressionist. He is best known for being the current voice of the Disney character Goofy, since 1986. He also voices Pluto, Horace Horsecollar and many other Disney characters. He was born in Pratt, Kansas. At age 10 he was already doing voice impressions. While in college he worked in radio and television. He worked as a stand-up comedian. In late 1986 he was one of hundreds of voice actors competing for a few roles at Disney studios. He got the voice acting job for Goofy, one of his favorite characters growing up. He has been the voice of Goofy ever since. In 2009 Farmer was named a Disney Legend. ==Filmography== ===Films=== List of voice performances in feature films Year Title Role Notes 1989 The Little Mermaid Additional voices 1991 Rover Dangerfield Farm voices 1991 Beauty and the Beast Additional voices 1992 Yakety Yak, Take it Another Again Goofy Music video 1992 Aladdin Additional voices 1994 The Lion King Additional voices 1995 Theodore Rex Additional voices 1995 A Goofy Movie Goofy Nominated - Annie Award for Voice Acting by a Male Performer in an Animated Feature Production 1995 Pocahontas Additional voices 1995 Toy Story Additional voices 1996 Space Jam Sylvester the Cat, Foghorn Leghorn, Yosemite Sam 1996 The Hunchback of Notre Dame Additional voices 1997 Cats Don't Dance Additional voices 1997 Hercules Additional voices 1998 Mulan Additional voices 1998 A Bug's Life Additional voices 1998 Tarzan Additional voices 1999 The Iron Giant Additional voices 1999 Toy Story 2 Additional voices 2000 The Emperor's New Groove Additional voices 2001 Monsters, Inc.
